page.title: 04EAST GRINSTEAD HIGH ST SHOPS
page.content: East grinstead is a wealthy area and its medaeval high street reflects this. The highest general rates in the town are paid by these shops and few mundane articles are on sale. No chain stores are here, but small independent shops. Goods on sale include clothes, leather items, crafts, gifts, books, antiques, soft furnishings and fitted kitchens. Just off the High St is Safeways. Supermarkets epitomise the 80's trend towards large shops selling a wide range of items. Safeways includes a chemists, bakers, off license & newsagents as well as a large range of groceries & has its own car park. Inevitably trade is taken away from the smaller shops. The whole town is now served by 2 supermarkets & one smaller grocer. The independent shops support a thriving Chamber of Commerce.
